Sentencas: The in-situ fabrication of an electron-blocking layer between the Ba-containing anode and the ceria-based electrolyte is an effective approach in suppressing the internal electronic leakage in ceria-based solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Tailoring the electron-blocking layer by addition of YSZ to Ba-containing anode for improvement of ceria-based solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: To improve the thickness of the electron-blocking layer and to research the effect of the layer thickness on the improvement of SOFC, a Ba-containing compound (0.6NiO-0.4BaZr(0.1)ACe(0)(.)(7)Y(0)(.2)O(3.delta)) modified by Y stabilized zirconia (YSZ) was employed as a composite anode in this research.
Titulo: Tailoring the electron-blocking layer by addition of YSZ to Ba-containing anode for improvement of ceria-based solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: SEM analyses demonstrated that the thickness of the interlayer can be simply controlled by regulating the proportion of YSZ at anode.
Titulo: Tailoring the electron-blocking layer by addition of YSZ to Ba-containing anode for improvement of ceria-based solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The in-situ formed interlayer in the cell with the anode modified by 20 mol% YSZ possesses a thickness of 0.9 gm which is more suitable for the cell achieving an enhanced performance.
Titulo: Tailoring the electron-blocking layer by addition of YSZ to Ba-containing anode for improvement of ceria-based solid oxide fuel cell
